topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
An ongoing attack across various EVM chains has siphoned over $107,000 from hundreds of wallets in small increments under $2,000 each. The underlying cause of the wallet compromises is currently unknown.
Sources:
- https://twitter.com/1697387633247150081/status/2006878331656921546

eventSummary:
Attackers allegedly compromised over 3 million records from multiple internal systems, leaking personal data including names, email addresses, dates of birth, IP addresses, and login IDs.
Sources:
- https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3mbff4ev7cj2u

entities: Amazon Web Services, Meta, Disney, OceanLotus, Magecart
